The '''potato font''', referred to internally as '''potatis.ttf''', is a [[font]] used in the first iteration of [[24w14potato]] as well as in the [[launcher]] for a short period.

== Definition ==
"{{cd|potatis.ttf}}" is used for most common characters, however, there are two characters ({{mono|U+D83E}}, {{mono|U+DD54}}) that are mapped to a graphic of a poisonous potato.

== Supported characters ==
{{Missing information|What other characters work?}}
